tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status with a T7 finish at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January.
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Finished T27 at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica inaugural Q-School at Doral's White Course to miss on his chance of earning Tour status by one shot… Carded a couple of 73s to miss the cut on his only start of the season on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory is the first hole-in-one he made at the age of 12... Has one brother, Otto... Graduated from Florida International University in 2011... Attended Hart HS in Newhall, CA in 2006... His favorite athlete outside of golf is Kobe Bryant... Favorite teams are the Florida Gators, L.A. Dodgers, L.A. Lakers and Manchester United... His love for cookies earned him the nickname "cookie monster"... Favorite quote / Personal motto: "Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender."... Twitter and Instagram name is @MCDeGreiff... Snapshat name is mcdegreiff79
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
